thread.title: Congressman mocks GOP with Craigslist ad for speaker
thread.title_full: Congressman mocks GOP with Craigslist ad for speaker

title: Congressman mocks GOP with Craigslist ad for speaker
text:
Congressman mocks GOP with Craigslist ad for speaker Rep. Kevin McCarthy pulls name out of consideration for speaker of House Published 10:10 AM CDT Oct 09, 2015 A Large Text Photos 
A Democratic congressman had some fun at the expense of House Republicans and their search to find a replacement for departing Speaker of the House John Boehner. Rep. Mark Takano, D-Calif., and his staffers posted a phony Craigslist job advertisement on their social media accounts for the speaker of the House position Boehner plans to vacate at the end of October. All eyes on Ryan as House Republicans meet 
Rep. Paul Ryan is telling House Republicans privately he is considering running for speaker, several members say. 
Ryan informed several members on the House floor of his deliberations, Rep. Chris Stewart, R-Utah, told CNN. Stewart added that he urged ...
